name: AHS Amino -Super Fan For American Horror Story vtm
name_original: AHS Amino -Super Fan For American Horror Story vtm
description: AHS fans unite! Join the fastest growing community for American Horror Story fans. Whether you're into Murder House, Asylum, Coven, Freak Show, or Hotel (or all of them), meet other AHS fanatics, characters, plotlines, fan theories, and share and discover fan creations!
